summary: A Breton woman I made myself
descriptionHtml:
Saved Breton I made after you escape the dragon and to the first town in the beginning. She followed Ralof. 
Can modify her by using \" ~ \" key and typing .showracemenu
*note* showracemenu will erase all makeup and i believe drop her to Lv1 

I had added some things as this is the save I was using myself, so she has some gear, a few stats in archery, one and two handed to 40 each and sneak to 100. Also has increased baggage space, over a mil and about 1000 lockpicks. feel free to drop this stuff if you dislike it, I was only using simple console commands(http://elderscrolls.wikia.com/wiki/Console_Commands_%28Skyrim%29) though the skills i did beating the crap out of poor Ralof(he makes a great sparring partner!)

To play, put file in my games > skyrim > saves


To achieve the full look I used the following mods(forgive me im kinda new to all this ^^:)

No More Blocky Faces by Xenius
http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=30#content (blocky faces)

Proper Clean Female Body by Imrinfected
http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=43#content

Less Ugly Elven Faces by Arlekin (also breton)
http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=29#content

Improved Female Skin Textures by Volek
http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=58#content

credits to those guys for making it possible to look good XD <3
author: KyriKat
